sentence: Other GOP candidates running for U.S. Senate in Ohio include "former state Republican Party Chairwoman Jane Timken, former state Treasurer Josh Mandel, businessman Bernie Moreno and investment banker Mike Gibbons," The Hill notes.
author: Brigid Kennedy
title: Ohio Senate candidate JD Vance 'honored' to have Marjorie Taylor Greene's endorsement

sentence: Others running in the race include former Ohio treasurer and two-time Senate candidate Josh Mandel; former Ohio GOP Chair Jane Timken; Cleveland businessman and luxury auto dealership giant Bernie Moreno; 2018 Ohio Republican Senate candidate Mike Gibbons, a Cleveland entrepreneur, real estate developer, and investment banker; and Matt Dolan, a longtime state lawmaker whose family owns Major League Baseball’s Cleveland Guardians.
author: Terresa Monroe-Hamilton
title: JD Vance massively triggers left with glowing MTG endorsement, vow to take country back from ‘scumbags’

sentence: Mr Vance's pivot from folksy intellectual to belligerent “patriot” is likely a tactic employed to take on his primary rival, former Ohio State Treasurer Josh Mandel.
author: Graig Graziosi
title: JD Vance mocked for celebrating Marjorie Taylor Greene endorsement as he vows to take US back from ‘scumbags’

author: Jordan Dixon-Hamilton
title: Bernie Moreno Suspends U.S. Senate Campaign

sentence: When sentient slime trail Marjorie Taylor Greene, who is somehow a member of Congress, endorsed Senate candidate, author, and asshole JD Vance, we wondered why she’d stiffed Josh Mandel, a seemingly more authentic MAGA zealot.
author: Stephen Robinson
title: Trump Pretty Sure Josh Mandel Too Unf*ckable For Endorsement

sentence: "Vance’s decline follows a $2 million-plus TV ad campaign from the Club for Growth and USA Freedom Fund, outside groups that are backing Vance rival Josh Mandel, which have portrayed Vance as an anti-Trump figure," writes Politico.
author: Brad Reed
title: JD Vance's campaign is going down in flames -- and his pollster warns he needs a 'course correction ASAP'

sentence: As Alex Eisenstadt writes for Politico about a freak-out internal memo from within the campaign of JD Vance, the wealthy investor challenging perennial GOP candidate Josh Mandel: “Vance’s decline follows a $2 million-plus TV ad campaign from the Club for Growth and USA Freedom Fund, outside groups that are backing Vance rival Josh Mandel, which have portrayed Vance as an anti-Trump figure.” (In reality, Vance has embraced Trump like a teenager mooning over a rock star.)
author: Thom Hartmann
title: Has America reached the 'tipping point' where most are sickened by the GOP?

sentence: A Coefficient poll of 613 likely voters found businessman Mike Gibbons leading a crowd of six candidates with 20% support and former state treasurer Josh Mandel in second with 18% support.
author: Michael Ginsberg
title: New Ohio Senate Poll Shows More Bad News For JD Vance

sentence: He's running against pro-Trump candidates like JD Vance, Josh Mandel and Jane Timken.
author: Patricia McKnight
title: Trump May Bypass Big Names Mandel, Vance in Ohio Race for Unknown Dolan

sentence: He and the leading candidate in the primary, former state treasurer Josh Mandel, have both offered vacuous misdirection about our border being more important than Ukraine’s.
title: Opinion: J.D. Vance’s repulsive spin about Putin and Ukraine faces a new test

sentence: He trails Mike Gibbons by 11 points and Josh Mandel by 9 points.
author: Jason Easley
title: JD Vance Sided With Putin And Now He May Lose The Ohio Senate GOP Primary

sentence: Things went downhill from there and a moderator came over like he was the referee at a fight: Mike Gibbons and Josh Mandel get in each other’s faces at tonight’s GOP #OHSen forum hosted by FreedomWorks.
author: John Sexton
title: Republican debate devolves into shouting match

sentence: He doesn’t have the temperament, experience, or fortitude to be a U.S. senator and Ohio voters got a firsthand look at just how unprepared Josh Mandel is to be a leader and that will be reflected at the ballot on May 3.” “Mike Gibbons got upset tonight that he was called out for his investments in Chinese oil,” said Scott Guthrie, Mandel’s campaign manager.
title: Ohio GOP Senate debate turns nasty as Gibbons and Mandel go nose-to-nose

sentence: Ohio Senate candidates Josh Mandel and Mike Gibbons were so close to blows that the moderator was forced to step in and get between the pair before the altercation could worsen.
author: STATION GOSSIP
title: No, it’s Not an Episode of Jerry Springer: Ohio GOP Senate Front-Runners Nearly Come to Blows During HEATED Primary Debate (VIDEO)

sentence: Both candidates are currently sitting atop the polls, with Josh Mandel being the consensus front-runner for months, and Gibbons coming on strong of late, surging to the top spot among GOP Senate candidates in two recent independent surveys.
author: Julian Conradson
title: No, it’s Not an Episode of Jerry Springer: Ohio GOP Senate Front-Runners Nearly Come to Blows During HEATED Primary Debate (VIDEO)

sentence: "He doesn't have the temperament, experience, or fortitude to be a US Senator and Ohio voters got a first-hand look at just how unprepared Josh Mandel has become and that will be reflected on the ballot on May 3," she added.
author: Kelsey Vlamis
title: 2 GOP frontrunners in the Ohio Senate race squared off during a heated debate moment: 'You watch what happens'

sentence: “We all volunteered to serve our country away from our families, putting our lives in danger, so people like Mike Gibbons could make millions.” Gibbons said Mandel initiated the physical aggression and made “several false, petty comments in an attempt to smear the new front-runner.” “Josh Mandel is unhinged, unfit and flailing — because he’s losing,” Gibbons campaign spokesperson Samantha Cotten said.
author: AP and TOI staff
title: Near-fight at Ohio GOP Senate debate between candidates Josh Mandel, Mike Gibbons

sentence: The debate became intense almost as soon as it began as former state treasurer Josh Mandel attacked investment banker Mike Gibbons' business dealings in his opening remarks.
title: Vets Demand Apology After Tense Clash in GOP Debate

sentence: Among them are former Ohio Republican Party chair Jane Timken, Ohio State Sen. Matt Dolan, Cleveland businessman Mike Gibbons and former Ohio treasurer Josh Mandel.

title: Ohio Senate race: What to know about JD Vance, venture capitalist running for office

sentence: At a debate last month, Gibbons and former Ohio Treasurer Josh Mandel, currently second in GOP primary polls, came close to a physical altercation on stage as Mandel slammed Gibbons for business links to China.

title: Ohio GOP Senate front-runner panned for taking $1.5M in PPP funds for bank

sentence: Sources told NBC News Thursday that the president is on the verge of endorsing the Hillbilly Elegy author, but other Republicans including rival candidate Josh Mandel are fighting hard to prevent it.

title: Ohio Republicans Are Trying to Stop a Trump Endorsement

sentence: Vance has been locked in a heated race against former state treasurer Josh Mandel, investment banker Mike Gibbons, former Ohio Republican Party chair Jane Timken, and state Sen. Matt Dolan, whose family owns the Cleveland Guardians.
author: Associated Press
title: Trump backs GOP’s JD Vance in US Senate primary in Ohio

sentence: The decision marks a major blow for Vance's top rivals — former state treasurer Josh Mandel, investment banker Mike Gibbons and former Ohio Republican Party chair Jane Timken — who have been locked in a heated and contentious race for both the nomination and Trump's backing in a primary that is now less than three weeks away.
author: JILL COLVIN and JULIE CARR SMYTH
title: Trump backs GOP’s JD Vance in US Senate primary in Ohio
